00096 }

00829 
00830 int ScenarioReport::scenario_report_detect() {
00831 int tab1=REPORT_X1,tab2=REPORT_X1+100,
00832     tab3=REPORT_X1+200,tab4=REPORT_X1+600;
00833 int vtab1=REPORT_Y1+15,vtab2=REPORT_Y1+70,
00834     vtab3=REPORT_Y1+100,vtab4=REPORT_Y1+350;
00835 
00836 if (!scenario_report_init_flag)
00837     return 0;
00838 if (mouse.single_click(200,50,400,140)) {
00839 scn_current_state=SCENARIO_ACHIEVEMENTS;
00840 sys.redraw_all_flag=1;
00841 return 1;
00842 }
00843 if (mouse.single_click(400,50,600,140)) {
00844 scn_current_state=SCENARIO_DESCRIPTION;
00845 sys.redraw_all_flag=1;
00846 return 1;
00847 }
00848 
00849 if(mouse.single_click(ZOOM_X1,ZOOM_Y1,ZOOM_X2,ZOOM_Y2,2)) {
00850 sys.set_staying_view_mode(0);
00851 sys.set_view_mode(MODE_NORMAL);
00852 return 1;
00853 }
00854 
00855 // for mail button
00856 if(mouse.single_click(8, 562, 76, 599, 2)
00857     ||
00858 (m.upper(mouse.is_key(mouse.scan_code, mouse.event_skey_state, (WORD) 0, K_UNIQUE_KEY))=='W')) {
00859 sys.set_staying_view_mode(0);
00860 sys.set_view_mode(MODE_NORMAL);
00861 return 1;
00862 }
00863 return 0;
00864 }
